name: Lone Echo (itch)
description:
Lone Echo is a game where you navigate  room where there is only 1 exit. The character has a shadow of themselves that “Mirrors” their movement. Players must reach the exit without the Character touching the Shadow.

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to move

Known bug where colliding with enemy in Level 3 may not reset the level

Programming by kacproc

Art by hamsterfish

Design by Staize
